availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: West was a farmer in Wayne County, Kentucky. He married Sophia Wilson on March 31, 1848. Their children were Joan and James Ellis.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Tunstal Quarles West (January 10, 1806-September 25, 1888),” Memorial #123355958, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=123355958 (accessed June 3, 2016); _Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne, Mill Springs, p. 42; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000591550, Wayne County Marriages, p. 64.
